movie.title: Cloud Atlas
movie.plot: Everything is connected: an 1849 diary of an ocean voyage across the Pacific; letters from a composer to his lover; a thriller about a conspiracy at a nuclear power plant; a farce about a publisher in a nursing home; a rebellious clone in futuristic Korea; and the tale of a tribe living on post-apocalyptic Hawaii far in the future.
movie.awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 16 wins & 76 nominations.
